bibl.title: Excavation at Bakchias (Fayyum) 1993-1996. (The Bologna and Lecce Universities Joint Expedition in Egypt.)
bibl.note: Preface. - Pp. 4-12: Sergio PERNIGOTTI, One Hundred Years after the First Excavation at Bakchias; - 13-25: Mario CAPASSO, One Hundred Years of Studies on the Bakchias Papyri: From the Excavation of Grenfell, Hunt and Hogarth to the Findings of 1996; - 26-30: Gabriele BITELLI and Luca VITTUARI, Surveying, Photogrammetry and Virtual Reality: The Site of Bakchias; - 31: Bibliography.
